newsitem.title: UK: UK grain futures close firmer but thinly traded.
newsitem.headline: UK grain futures close firmer but thinly traded.

text.p: UK grain futures closed firmer on a rebound from Tuesday's weaker finish, although actual buying interest was limited.
Wheat futures finished 1.05 to 1.10 sterling up after trading some 370 lots, while barley ended 0.25 sterling higher. Barley traded 193 lots.
The delivered market lacking material from the farmers and hampered by currency gyrations remained poorly traded.
Amsterdam wheat futures were once again ignored.
